content: Make sure not to lock on and face the smaller threat, or you’ll be rammed by the Pitstone. Instead use your Cloud Step to get around and sneak attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
Make sure not to lock on and face the smaller threat, or you’ll be rammed by the Pitstone. Instead use your Cloud Step to get around and sneak attack.
